## Research Approach

We integrate [**artificial intelligence**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/area/artificial-intelligence/) with [**classical experimental techniques**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/area/classical-methods/) for [**drug discovery and development**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/area/drug-development/) and other [**areas of research**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research). 
Check out a few of our publicly visible [**Ongoing projects**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/research/projects) at the  [**Lab GitHub**](https://github.com/mcphersonlab), [**Zenodo**](https://zenodo.org/communities/mcphersonlab) or listed under [**publications**](https://mcphersonlab.github.io/publications/)

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

from pathlib import Path
import re
import html

mentorship_dir = Path("mentorship")

if mentorship_dir.exists():
    entries = []
    for entry_dir in sorted(mentorship_dir.iterdir()):
        if entry_dir.is_dir() and not entry_dir.name.startswith("_"):
            index_file = entry_dir / "index.qmd"
            if index_file.exists():
                try:
                    # Read the frontmatter
                    with open(index_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                        content = f.read()
                        
                    # Extract key fields from frontmatter
                    title_match = re.search(r'^title:\s*["\'](.+?)["\']', content, re.MULTILINE)
                    url_match = re.search(r'^url_source:\s*(.+)$', content, re.MULTILINE)
                    pub_match = re.search(r'^publication:\s*["\'](.+?)["\']', content, re.MULTILINE)
                    
                    if title_match and url_match:
                        # Escape HTML to prevent XSS
                        title = html.escape(title_match.group(1))
                        url = url_match.group(1).strip()
                        
                        # Validate URL uses safe protocol
                        if not (url.startswith('https://') or url.startswith('http://')):
                            continue
                            
                        publication = html.escape(pub_match.group(1)) if pub_match else ""
                        
                        entry_html = f'''
<div class="quarto-post">
  <h5 class="listing-title">
    <a href="{html.escape(url, quote=True)}" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">{title}</a>
  </h5>
  <p class="listing-publication">{publication}</p>
</div>
'''
                        entries.append(entry_html)
                except (IOError, OSError) as e:
                    # Skip entries that cannot be read
                    continue
                except Exception as e:
                    # Skip entries with other parsing errors
                    continue
    
    if entries:
        print('<div id="mentorship-listing">')
        for entry in entries:
            print(entry)
        print('</div>')
    else:
        print('<p>No mentorship resources available yet.</p>')
else:
    print('<p>No mentorship resources available yet.</p>')
```
